title: Live drawings of the human experience | Jarrett J. Krosoczka
itunes:author: Jarrett J. Krosoczka
description: In this live drawing performance and poignant autobiographical journey, author and illustrator Jarrett J. Krosoczka sketches some life-shaping moments, showing us how drawing and storytelling can help us honor and remain close to those we've lost.
itunes:subtitle: Live drawings of the human experience | Jarrett J. Krosoczka
itunes:summary: In this live drawing performance and poignant autobiographical journey, author and illustrator Jarrett J. Krosoczka sketches some life-shaping moments, showing us how drawing and storytelling can help us honor and remain close to those we've lost.
